Game.Name: American Pro Football (Europe)
Game.plot: It's the snap!You sweep to the right.The quarterback hands you the ball.You head for daylight as the linemen open a hole.Suddenly, 250 lbs. of screaming tackle is heading your way.He wants to make you splat city.What will you do?This game gives you the chance to find out.With Walter Payton Football you can play against the computer, or against a friend, in a Monday Night Game or in a series on the Road to The Superbowl.Choose from 28 west, central and eastern teams.Offense and defense.Should you run or pass?Will a reverse throw 'em off guard?In the middle of a hot series, you can save your standings with a Password save.If you like football, then Sega's Walter Payton Football is the game for you!Cheat: Score a touchdown every timeChoose a Bomb Pass play, but instead of passing it, run with it. The CPU opponent cannot stop this for some reason.
Game.Notes: American Pro Football, known as Walter Payton Football in the US, is a sports game developed and published by Sega for the Sega Master System.
